Package game.actions

Class SummonAction

java.lang.Object
game.engine.actions.Action
game.actions.SummonAction
public class SummonAction
extends Action
An Action to summon a guest from another realm (i.e. activate a Summon Sign).
Author:
Ho Seng
See Also:
Action, SummonSign, Location
